attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the cost of diesel now at some
 outlets is higher than petrol there is it seems to be a conspiracy to maintain the high cost of diesel,there has always being a differance in price but no longer?

rejection.details: Please provide full name and meaningful title of petition.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
